txt.en: 'You may have noticed a number of Wargs roaming about this diseased forest. The Orcs unleashed a large pack of them shortly after our arrival -- presumably to keep our forces at bay while they strengthened their defences.\n\n'Should you wish to hunt them, you will find that the Wargs are fitted with war-collars that make fine trophies; otherwise, we risk having them find us here and bring the Orcs down upon us with their accursed howls.'

'It appears that you have dealt with the Wargs admirably! The Orcs will no doubt miss their loathsome companions, but for the time being, this will allow the Malledhrim a free hand as we try to dislodge the Orcs from their outposts in Taur Morvith.'
'The hounds of Sauron must be routed, [placeholder]. Our forces are slowed by their harassment.'
The Orcs of Taur Morvith have unleashed packs of Wargs to harry intruders who would dare approach through the forests to the north.
Wargs can be found roaming throughout Taur Morvith.\n\nIavassúl has asked you to hunt down the Wargs roaming Taur Morvith and collect their war-collars as trophies.
Bring the collars to Iavassúl at Iavassúl's Watch
Iavassúl is at Iavassúl's Watch in Taur Morvith.\n\nYou should return the war-collars to Iavassúl.
